problem.markdown:
>>What type of force do ropes and cables resist?<< ( ) Compression (x) Tension ( ) Bending ( ) Shear
[explanation] You may only pull on a rope or cable, thus causing tension. [explanation]
problem.p: What type of force do ropes and cables resist?

choicegroup.label: What type of force do ropes and cables resist?

div.p: You may only pull on a rope or cable, thus causing tension.
